name: No Three In A Row Sudoku

rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Digits in any three consecutive cells in any row or column must not be of the same parity.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Digits in any three consecutive cells in any row or column must not be of the same parity.
